item.title: How to enjoy a poem?
item.description: Open disclaimer at first - I am no expert at poetry.

item.title: Strains of thought
item.description: Little Sparks on your mind Bright, timid and of different kind,

item.title: Dichotomy
item.description: I drew it on a moonless night but the lines came to me on a sunny afternoon.
